trainer.bio: I coach women who want to feel strong and confident — without extremes or burnout. You'll get a plan that's clear, flexible, and built around your lifestyle, plus accountability that keeps you showing up even when motivation disappears.

hero.headline: Get stronger — and stay consistent.
hero.subheadline: Online + in-person coaching for women who want a clear plan, accountability that sticks, and progress they can feel.
hero.systemVibe: Simple plan + built-in check-ins so you never feel lost.

programs.title: 12-Week Strength Transformation
programs.description: Build lean muscle and lasting confidence with a structured plan built around your life.

programs.title: Busy Professional Program
programs.description: Strength coaching that fits tight schedules — efficient workouts, real results.

programs.title: Online Coaching Lite
programs.description: A starter plan for beginners ready to build a foundation with guidance.

testimonials.quote: I used to feel drained and frustrated no matter how much I tried. Ava helped me reconnect with my body and rebuild strength without burnout. For the first time, I actually enjoy moving again — and the changes haven't just been physical, they've been mental too.
testimonials.name: Sophie Lammers
testimonials.subtitle: 12-Week Transformation Program
